0: Valeim is restarting to apply an update!
Valheim backup to file @BACKUP_FILE@ is starting

[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

/hr/diaoul.github.io-helm-charts-emqx.title: emqx helm release
/hr/diaoul.github.io-helm-charts-emqx.name: emqx
/hr/diaoul.github.io-helm-charts-emqx.doc:
EMQX is a scalable, open-source MQTT message broker that enables you to build and manage real-time IoT systems and applications.

MQTT is a lightweight communication protocol for connecting devices and applications, making it an ideal solution for IoT and machine-to-machine (M2M) communication.

Whether you're looking to build a smart home system, implement a remote monitoring solution, or simply want to connect your devices and applications, EMQ X is a powerful and flexible tool for your MQTT needs.

Popular home applications that support MQTT are:

  • Home Assistant
  • ESPHome
  • Zigbee2MQTT
  • ZWaveJS2MQTT
  • NodeRED

0:
[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

[rack]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  pollinterval = 15
  desc = Rack UPS
if [ $(curl -s https://ipinfo.io/ip) = $(dig +short ${SECRET_GATEWAY}) ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi
